articles.title: Happy New Year! Your Corvette has been speared by a signpost
articles.description: HALLANDALE BEACH, Fla. (AP) — A flying highway sign gave a driver an unwelcome New Year's Eve gift when it impaled the rear window of his Corvette during a highway mishap that left multiple vehicles damaged in south Florida.

articles.title: Police: Woman charged in slaying of 2 children, adult man
articles.description: GREENSBORO, N.C. (AP) — Police in North Carolina say a woman has been charged with murder in the deaths of two children and an adult.
articles.content:
GREENSBORO, N.C. (AP) Police in North Carolina say a woman has been charged with murder in the deaths of two children and an adult.

articles.title: Crews search Lake Michigan after big wave knocks 2 off pier
articles.description: HOLLAND, Mich. (AP) — Crews searched Lake Michigan on Thursday for a missing teenage girl after a large wave knocked her and another person off a pier along western Michigan and she couldn't get out of the water, authorities said.

articles.title: Georgia judge dies from injuries sustained in hit and run
articles.description: BUFORD, Ga. (AP) — A magistrate judge in Gwinnett County has died after she was struck by a hit-and-run driver nearly two weeks ago, authorities say.
articles.content:
BUFORD, Ga. (AP) A magistrate judge in Gwinnett County has died after she was struck by a hit-and-run driver nearly two weeks ago, authorities say.
